data.name: Ltd Payback Us
data.short_description: Imposter sites like this one exist for one purpose only: to scam people out of their money or personal details by masquerading as a legitimate site like Payback. Paybackltd.us may look like the real deal, but it’s a clone site - a carbon copy of our own -  and we’re currently in the process of taking legal action to get it removed.
data.review:
Imposter sites like this one exist for one purpose only: to scam people out of their money or personal details by masquerading as a legitimate site like Payback. Paybackltd.us may look like the real deal, but it’s a clone site - a carbon copy of our own - and we’re currently in the process of taking legal action to get it removed. This site and its affiliates will be unable to help you recover any scammed funds but instead will seek to con you out of further money. Avoid Paybackltd.us at all costs!


More Information

Phone numbers:

+1646 3787804 lead to this number -Tel:+35315260075



Location (Our old address):

David Ben Gurion Rd 38, Ramat Gan, Israel, 52573

data.name: Firm Law MorganBell
data.short_description: Fake law firm. Here at Payback, supporting our clients and helping them get the justice they deserve is what makes us tick. This is why it’s so frustrating to see the slew of websites that have recently cropped up, copying Payback’s service and proposition.
data.review:
Fake law firm


Here at Payback, supporting our clients and helping them get the justice they deserve is what makes us tick. This is why it’s so frustrating to see the slew of websites that have recently cropped up, copying Payback’s service and proposition.

Morganbelllawfirm.com is one of many sites that have sprung up, purporting to help victims of scams and frauds. When choosing a company to help you recover money lost to a scam, it’s vital to ensure that the company is a legitimate and reliable concern to avoid being conned further.

data.name: Pb-Limited
data.short_description: Avoid this site at all costs. This nefarious service has merely replicated our site and can not be trusted. As a trusted entity, Payback is seeking legal recourse against this imposter, who has simply copied our entire site and added a different set of contact details.
data.review:
Avoid this site at all costs. This nefarious service has merely replicated our site and can not be trusted. As a trusted entity, Payback is seeking legal recourse against this imposter, who has simply copied our entire site and added a different set of contact details.

This criminal endeavor will not be able to help you if you have suffered an online financial scam and more than likely could lead you into more hot water. All claims made by pb-limited.com are unverified and, as such, should not be trusted with any of your personal details. Steer clear.

data.name: Inc Payback
data.short_description: Steer well clear of this website, which has been identified by Google as highly likely to be a phishing site, using forged content in a bid to trick visitors into disclosing their personal and financial information. It’s best to not even visit such sites and certainly to never click on links within them, which could contain malware and other nasties.
data.review:
Steer well clear of this website, which has been identified by Google as highly likely to be a phishing site, using forged content in a bid to trick visitors into disclosing their personal and financial information. It’s best to not even visit such sites and certainly to never click on links within them, which could contain malware and other nasties.

Payback-inc.com is an example of a dodgy site purporting to be a trustworthy company - it’s important to be aware that such nefarious sites are out there and take steps to avoid them.

Defined by Google as a dangerous and unreliable site

Apparently the site has not been updated for a long time

data.review:
While this scam recovery site may look legit, it’s been the subject of a large number of negative reviews on independent review sites, with complaints from users claiming that reclaimlylosses.com has stolen their funds and ignored communications.

While Payback can’t verify either these claims or those made by the company itself, it’s always best to proceed with great caution where such concerning reviews exist. data.name: Financials Stainway
data.short_description: Just because a website boasts a .org address doesn’t guarantee its reliability or trustworthiness. Stainways is another site that’s cropped up recently, trying to cash in on the reputation and success of established sites like Payback.
data.review:
Just because a website boasts a .org address doesn’t guarantee its reliability or trustworthiness. Stainways is another site that’s cropped up recently, trying to cash in on the reputation and success of established sites like Payback.

This company offers a range of recovery services, all in the vein of ours, and the textual content of the site itself is also very similar. Always exercise caution regarding a site like stainways-financials.org, which closely follows the pattern of an existing website like Payback’s. If in any doubt, it’s best to avoid it.

data.name: Paybackltd
data.short_description: This is another site and service to avoid entirely. Paybackltd.org has merely copied an older design of our website, making minor amendments to include new contact details.
data.review:
This is another site and service to avoid entirely. Paybackltd.org has merely copied an older design of our website, making minor amendments to include new contact details. They have done so in order to make the most of our strong reputation in the industry, and legal action by ourselves is ongoing. All claims on their website are bogus, and the likely criminal nature of their operation should be side-stepped.

Another clone site this appears exactly like Payback’s - the entire content of our website has been copied and pasted, with just the contact details changed to those of the scammers. To protect victims of scams from falling foul of this con, we’re in the process of bringing legal action against this immoral company in order to get the site shut down.

Many people have already been scammed by such outfits, so stay vigilant regarding cloned sites, such as that of pbrecovery-ltd.com, and never give any personal, financial, or other sensitive information to these crooks.
